177: Description What is a Night Auditor? The Night Auditor is in charge of the Hotel during the overnight shift, making sure that the overnight staff maintains the safety and security of the guests and the hotel property.. A night auditor is responsible for checking in guests arriving at night; assisting guests with their overnight requests and balance accounts from the day shift. The night auditor also reconciles all accounts and closes the business day. Essentially, a night auditors role is to provide excellent customer service to guests and keep the front desk and accounting operations running smoothly. A high school diploma or equivalent along with 2 years' experience hospitality is required. Successful night auditors possess excellent mathematical skills and strong customer service skills. You would be using the Hilton OnQ system to run the night audit programs, make any necessary corrections and close the business day and ensure all systems are updated for the new business day. This Full time position comes with an excellent benefits package that includes participation in the company 401K program. This also includes team member travel privileges' with both Hilton and the Crescent Hotel and Resorts Mgmt. company. Job Type: Full-time Salary: $18.00 per hour Benefits: 401(k) Dental insurance Employee discount Health insurance Paid time off Retirement plan Vision insurance Signing bonus Ability to commute/relocate: Nashville, TN 37201: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required) Experience: Hotel experience: 1 year (Preferred) Work Location: One location ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS: Prepare daily Restaurant Revenue Report data by auditing Point of Service tapes/journals to breakdown revenue, covers, waiters' fees, tips paid out and settlements by type and cashier. Basic mathematical skills and ability to make accurate mathematical calculations using a 10-key. Ability to effectively deal with guest and employee concerns in a friendly and positive manner. Ability to access and accurately input information using a moderately complex computer system. PERFORMANCE STANDARDS Customer Satisfaction: Our customers are what we are about. One of the keys to a positive guest experience is positive interaction with Crescent staff. Safety & Security: The safety and security of our guests and associates is of utmost importance to Crescent.
